blog.name: cap-owns-my-ass
blog.title:
some people move on
but not us,
Not Us.
blog.description:
Sara | 23 | Bi | Sri Lankan

💃🏽Future MCU actress & Oscar winner💃🏽

summary:
On a bit of a serious note...
Y’ALL PHANNIES SHOULD SERIOUSLY APOLOGIZE TO CAT (aka catrific)!!! Y’ALL GAVE HER SUCH A SHIT TIME...
body:
On a bit of a serious note…

Y’ALL PHANNIES SHOULD SERIOUSLY APOLOGIZE TO CAT (aka catrific)!!! Y’ALL GAVE HER SUCH A SHIT TIME FOR BEING CLOSE TO DAN (& Phil) EVEN THOUGH ALL THIS WHILE ALL SHE WAS WAS A GOOD GREAT FRIEND TO THE BOYS!!!

She was one of those people who made Dan feel safe & at home!! He wasn’t/ isn’t close to many people because of his internal struggles. But he chose to be close to her (and Louise and a few others) because he obviously felt safe!!

-

YOU STUPID C**** HAD TO GO AND HATE HER EVEN THOUGH SHE MADE DAN HAPPY. ALL BECAUSE OF YOUR DELUSIONAL SHIPPING!! listen shipping’s fine as long as it stays within the fandom(s) and doesn’t affect their personal lives. So the fact that you chose to hurt her is SO SO WRONG!!

SO IF I DON’T SEE Y’ALL LOUD MOUTHS APOLOGIZING TO CAT ASAP YOU WILL HAVE HELL TO PAY!!!

blog.name: trashcan-in-her-20s
blog.title: ugh
blog.description:
krissie | 23 | she/her | england |
I am a massive nerd come view my messy selection of random posts. I love to reblog 200000 things then leave... never even heard of a queue :/

summary: I'm really pissed off rn...
body:
I’m really pissed off rn…

So loads of people I follow are reblogging stuff saying “respect Dan and Phil’s private life” and “don’t say we been knew”

And then I scroll down and see the same person has reblogged another post that was like “I mean we all knew, but it’s just nice to hear it from Dan”

FUCK EVERY SINGLE ONE OF YOU DOING THIS… stop stereotyping people and don’t assume someone’s sexuality. Just because he’s come out now, doesn’t validate you’re shitty behaviour.

“Oh, I mean we all knew anyway” FUCK YOU. FUCK ALL OF YOU. YOU ARE THE VERY PEOPLE DAN WAS TALKING ABOUT IN HIS VIDEO. YOU ARE NOT FANS, YOU ARE HORRIBLE PEOPLE. Especially seeing as he specifically told you not to say “we been knew” BUT YOU SAID IT ANYWAY!

reblog.comment:

FUCK EVERY SINGLE ONE OF YOU DOING THIS… stop stereotyping people and don’t assume someone’s sexuality. Just because he’s come out now, doesn’t validate you’re shitty behaviour.

“Oh, I mean we all knew anyway” FUCK YOU. FUCK ALL OF YOU. YOU ARE THE VERY PEOPLE DAN WAS TALKING ABOUT IN HIS VIDEO. YOU ARE NOT FANS, YOU ARE HORRIBLE PEOPLE. Especially seeing as he specifically told you not to say “we been knew” BUT YOU SAID IT ANYWAY!
